question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/txn_provider/default.rs] [Function: new_without_info()] [Allocation Failure] If Vec::resize() at line 25 fails due to OOM, does Rust's allocator panic, and is this panic handled gracefully to prevent validator crash? (Medium)
